column4: I'm installing a new hard drive on my server, was following https://help.ubuntu.com/community/InstallingANewHardDrive but on the sudo lshw -C disk step I get no results, not even for my existing disks. How can I see what logical name my disk has?
Not reporting it - does blkid show partitions only, or will it show an unpartitioned drive?
only formatted partitions.  you could use "sudo fdisk -l" to list all partitions perhaps
